key_terms.permitted_use: Personal, non-commercial, educational purposes. Limited commercial use for Public Domain/Citation Required series.
key_terms.api_access: Free API available. Must display disclaimer: 'This product uses the FRED API but is not endorsed or certified by the Federal Reserve Bank of St. Louis.'
key_terms.redistribution: Prohibited for third-party proprietary content. Cannot replicate FRED essential experience.
key_terms.ai_ml_restriction: PROHIBITED - 'You may not use the FRED Services or FRED Content in connection with large language models, deep learning, generative artificial intelligence'
key_terms.attribution: Required. Use suggested citation from each graph's Cite tab.
key_terms.commercial_use: Limited - only for Public Domain or Citation Required series with proper attribution
key_terms.copyright_status: Three levels: Pre-approval required, Citation required, Public Domain

compliance_assessment.concern: AI/ML restriction may apply to calendar event tagging if considered AI use
compliance_assessment.mitigation: Calendar uses FRED for event timing only, not for AI training or generation

key_terms.api_access: Limited. Automated access via robots/scrapers prohibited.
key_terms.redistribution: Cannot create competing databases or data feeds
key_terms.content_license: User content grants Yahoo worldwide, royalty-free, perpetual license
key_terms.automated_access: PROHIBITED - 'Cannot access using any automated means, devices, programs, algorithms or methodologies, including robots, spiders, scrapers'
key_terms.liability: Services provided as-is with no warranties

compliance_assessment.calendar_use_case: Equity earnings dates and corporate events
compliance_assessment.concern: Automated access restriction applies to scraping
compliance_assessment.mitigation: Use official Yahoo Finance API or licensed data feed

key_terms.api_limits: Free tier: 25 requests/day. Premium for higher volume.
key_terms.realtime_data: Premium-only due to regulatory requirements (stock exchanges, FINRA, SEC)
key_terms.open_source: Wrappers allowed if original response content preserved

compliance_assessment.calendar_use_case: Market data for event impact analysis
compliance_assessment.mitigation: Premium API key for production use

ALPHA_VANTAGE.manual_action_required: Download full TOS PDF from website and archive

key_terms.sdk_repositories: Python, NodeJS, R available on GitHub

compliance_assessment.concern: Full TOS not accessible via automated fetch

key_terms.risk_disclosure: Trading in financial instruments involves high risks

compliance_assessment.concern: Full TOS not accessible - JavaScript rendered
